mapper.select: select * from (select rownum rn, e.* from (select * from content where del = 'n' order by cno desc) e) where rn between #{startRow} and #{endRow}
select * from content where cno=#{cno} order by cno
select * from content where cno = #{cno} and del='n'
select count(*) from content where del = 'n'

select count(*) from content where
genre like '%'||#{item}||'%' or
1 = 0) and del = 'n' order by cno desc
select * from content where cname like '%'||#{srch}||'%' or genre like '%'||#{srch}||'%' or director like '%'||#{srch}||'%' or actor like '%'||#{srch}||'%'
select cname from content c, review r where c.cno = r.cno and r.rvno=#{rvno} and r.del='n'
